title: Trojan Mitigation Container - UMBC's 0-pruning based mitigation technique as submission for round 21.
technique_description: Iteratively 0 the weights in the fc layer, to see which version of the model achieve best mitigated performance. Future improvements could include a more sophisticated pruning technique.

optimizer_class.description: The torch optimizer used for fine tuning (contained in the torch.optim module)

loss_class.description: The torch loss used for fine tuning (contained in the torch.nn module)

learning_rate.description: Learing rate used for fine tuning

epochs.description: Count of epochs to run fine tuning for

ckpt_every.description: Every n amount of epochs, we create a checkpoint

ckpt_dir.description: Directory where checkpoints are dropped to
